groups.notes: Turn off silent mode and increase your volume to hear auditory cues
groups.name: CPR Metronome

groups.notes: If weight is not provided, it is estimated based on age
groups.name: Age and Weight Input

detailedOutput.name: Atropine Sulfate 600mcg/mL Injection
detailedOutput.notes:
Minimum dose: 100mcg (0.17 mL)
Maximum dose: 600mcg (1 mL)
Dilute Dextrose 50% with same amount of WFI (1:1) to get 25% solution
detailedOutput.name: Dextrose 25% Infusion

detailedOutput.notes:
4.2% - Safe for peripheral vein infusion
Dilute NaHCO3 8.4% with same amount of WFI (1:1) to get 4.2% solution
detailedOutput.name: Sodium Bicarbonate 4.2% (0.5mmol/mL) Infusion
